info.name: one cube challenge ( 253 chars )
info.description:
deeper golfing of fabrice's 2015 "one cube challenge - v3" [url]https://shadertoy.com/view/Xs33RH[/url]

could it be shorter ? ( with same look ).

renderpass.code:
// deeper golfing of https://shadertoy.com/view/Xs33RH  ( 265 chars )

#define L  *I ; \
    o += 3e-3 / length( clamp( dot(u-a,v=b-a)/dot(v,v), 0.,1.) *v - u+a );a//
#define P  b=c= vec2(r.x,.7)/(2.8+r.y) L;             \
           b=a L=c L=c; r = I*r.yx;                  //
void mainImage(out vec4 O, vec2 U) {
	vec2 I = vec2(1,-1), c = iResolution.xy,
         u = ( U+U - c ) / c.y,  a,b,o,v,
         r = sin(iTime-vec2(0,11));
       //r = sin(iTime-11.*O.xw);    // no longer working since macro main no longer allowed
    P  o-=o;
    P P P P   O += o.x;
}/*





// --- 255 chars        

#define L  *I ; \
    o += 3e-3 / length( clamp( dot(u-a,v=b-a)/dot(v,v), 0.,1.) *v - u+a )//

           b=a L;   a=c L;   a=c; r = I*r.yx;        //
#define mainImage(O,U)                                \
	vec2 I = vec2(1,-1), c = iResolution.xy,          \
         u = ( U+U - c ) / c.y,  a,b,o,v,             \
         r = sin(iTime-11.*O.xw);                     \
    P  o-=o;                                          \
    P P P P   O += o.x                               /*





// --- 259 chars        

#define L  *I ; o+= 3e-3 / length( clamp( dot(u-a,v=b-a)/dot(v,v), 0.,1.) *v - u+a )//
#define P  b=c= vec2(r.x,1)/(4.+r.y) L;               \
           b=a L;   a=c L;   a=c; r= I*r.yx;         //
#define mainImage(O,U)                                \
	vec2 I = vec2(1,-1), c = iResolution.xy,          \
         u = ( U+U - c ) / c.y,  a,b,o,v,             \
         r = sin(iTime-.8*I); r += I*r.yx;            \
    P  o-=o;                                          \
    P P P P   O += o.x                               /*

*/
renderpass.name: Image
